translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Triad-Couplet-Condition-Text

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.43. Atītārammaṇattika, Hetuduka🔽Atītārammaṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naatītārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe sattarasa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi          atīta ārammaṇam hetum dhammam paṭicca na atīta ārammaṇaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe sattarasa pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: With a past object, with cause,🔽With a past object, with a cause, with respect to a condition, a condition that is not past object, that is not a cause, arises. (Abbreviated.) With a cause, twenty-one. With an object, nine. … With a support, twenty-one.

original: Atītārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāgatārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: atīta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na anāgata ārammaṇaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
translated: With a past object, with a cause, with respect to a condition, a condition that is not future object, that is not a cause, arises. (Abbreviated.) With a cause, nine. … With an object, nine. … With an object, with a support, nine. … With a support, nine. … With a support, with an object, nine. … With a cause, with an object, nine. … With a cause, with an object, with a support, nine.
